parameters.name: ModelWindowCount
parameters.description: Number of child windows for this frame

title: IFrame.IGetModelWindows
description: Gets the child model windows for this frame.

parameters.name: ModelWindowCount
parameters.description: Number of child windows for this frame

returns: in-process, unmanaged C++: Pointer to an array of model windows VBA, VB.NET, C#, and C++/CLI: Not supported See In-process Methods for details about this type of method.
remarks:
Call
IFrame::GetModelWindowCount
before calling this method to get the size of the array.
